wikisearch-missing-frontend: No frontend has been configured for WikiSearch
wikisearch-api-invalid-json: The parameter '$1' expected a valid JSON object: $2
wikisearch-api-invalid-pageid: The given page ID is invalid: the page does not exist or has no config associated with it
wikisearch-invalid-dbms: WikiSearch does not support database type `$1`
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-summary: Perform advanced search queries against an ElasticSearch backend
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-param-pageid: The page ID of the page that contains the search engine config for the current request
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-param-term: The search query term used for full-text search
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-param-filter: An array of filters (as JSON) to apply to the search
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-param-aggregati: An array of aggregations (as JSON) to apply to the search
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-param-sortings: An array of sortings (as JSON) to apply to the search
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-param-from: From which offset to return search results
apihelp-query+WikiSearch-param-limit: The maximum number of search results to return
apihelp-query+WikiSearchHighlight-param-: The query to generate highlights from
The properties to generate highlights from
The page for which you want to generate highlights
The maximum number of highlights to return
The size of the snippets to return (leave blank to highlight individual words)
apihelp-query+WikiSearchHighlight-summar: Create highlight snippets from an ElasticSearch search query
apihelp-query+WikiSearchCombobox-summary: Create combobox aggregations for a property
apihelp-query+WikiSearchCombobox-param-p: The property to create the combobox aggregation for
apihelp-query+WikiSearchCombobox-param-l: The maximum number of aggregations to return
